newsitem.title: USA: Reliv launches food additive for arthritis.
newsitem.headline: Reliv launches food additive for arthritis.

text.p: Reliv International Inc said Monday it introduced a food product called Arthaffect that can help alleviate arthritis symptoms.

Arthaffect -- Reliv's first entry in the so-called functional food category -- features an ingredient called Arthred, which has been clinically shown to combat the effects of degenerative joint conditions, the company said.
Functional foods are nutritional products designed to influence specific functions of the body.
Reliv said clinical studies in Germany have shown that Arthred can help reduce pain, stiffness, cold-weather sensitivity, fatigue and other symptoms of degenerative joint conditions.
Arthaffect, a tasteless, odorless powder, can be mixed with any beverage.
